text: Norma is a food discount store. It has more than 1,300 stores in Germany, France, the Czech Republic and Austria. The stores are appearing as Norma and Norma-Rodi, as Norma has bought the company Rodi. It was founded in 1964. == Other websites == * Official website Category:1960s establishments in Germany Category:1964 establishments in Europe Category:Supermarkets of Germany Category:Nuremberg
title: Norma (supermarket)
